languages.text: "Помнишь ли ты, как в шпиле Опустошительной бури меня обуяла ярость, а ты напомнил{mf||а} мне, за кого мне должно сражаться?"
"Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire, and you reminded me who I was supposed to be fighting for?"
languages.original_text: "Помнишь ли ты, как в шпиле Опустошительной бури меня обуяла ярость, а ты напомнил{mf||а} мне, за кого мне должно сражаться?"

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire, and you reminded me who I was supposed to be fighting for?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire, and you reminded me who I was supposed to be fighting for?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire, and you reminded me who I was supposed to be fighting for?"

traits.locale_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire, and you reminded me who I was supposed to be fighting for?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¿Recuerda cuando me vi abrumado por la ira en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora y me recordó por quién se supone que lucho?».
languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire, and you reminded me who I was supposed to be fighting for?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Recuerda cuando me vi abrumado por la ira en la torre de la Tempestad Asoladora y me recordó por quién se supone que lucho?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你还记得我在狂风尖塔里被愤怒冲昏头脑的时候吗？当时是你提醒了我，让我想起我应该为谁而战。”
languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire, and you reminded me who I was supposed to be fighting for?"

traits.locale_text: “你还记得我在狂风尖塔里被愤怒冲昏头脑的时候吗？当时是你提醒了我，让我想起我应该为谁而战。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔で俺が怒りに飲み込まれたとき、戦う理由をお前が思い出させてくれただろう？」
languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire, and you reminded me who I was supposed to be fighting for?"

traits.locale_text: 「リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔で俺が怒りに飲み込まれたとき、戦う理由をお前が思い出させてくれただろう？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Vous vous souvenez quand la colère m'a submergé, dans la flèche de la Tempête ravageuse, et que vous m'avez rappelé pour qui j'étais censé me battre ? »
languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire, and you reminded me who I was supposed to be fighting for?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous souvenez quand la colère m'a submergé, dans la flèche de la Tempête ravageuse, et que vous m'avez rappelé pour qui j'étais censé me battre ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch noch, wie ich im Turm des plündernden Sturms vom Zorn übermannt wurde, und Ihr mich daran erinnert habt, für wen ich eigentlich kämpfen sollte?"
languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire, and you reminded me who I was supposed to be fighting for?"

traits.locale_text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch noch, wie ich im Turm des plündernden Sturms vom Zorn übermannt wurde, und Ihr mich daran erinnert habt, für wen ich eigentlich kämpfen sollte?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire, and you reminded me who I was supposed to be fighting for?"

languages.text: "Müfteris Kasırga kulesinde öfkeye teslim olduğum zamanı hatırlıyor musun? Bana kimin için savaşmam gerektiğini hatırlatmıştın."
languages.original_text: "Do you remember when I was overcome with rage in the Reaving Tempest's spire, and you reminded me who I was supposed to be fighting for?"

traits.locale_text: "Müfteris Kasırga'nın kulesinde öfkeye teslim olduğum zamanı hatırlıyor musun? Bana kimin için savaşmam gerektiğini hatırlatmıştın."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
